QuestData.Title: Obliterating Ogres
QuestData.Description: With actual ogre mages present, the Highmaul have been increasing patrols and aggression.$b$bThinning their ranks will go a long way to deterring the Highmaul from making a comeback in Nagrand.$b$bHead up to my sister Mirana afterwards, she should have more news.
QuestData.RewardText: Perfect, they will have to concentrate more on base defense now. Hopefully things will get back to normal out there.
